title: Bulls are 25-1 to win NBA title
text:
Despite returning with pretty much the same team , the Bulls odds to win the NBA championship this season have doubled with some sports books. Going into last season under coach Tom Thibodeau, the Bulls were listed anywhere from 8-1 to 12-1 to win the title. This season, Fred Hoiberg’s team is as high as 25-1 with some books .
Here are some odds and ends from MyTopSportsBooks.com :
Odds to win the 2016 NBA Title Cleveland Cavaliers: 5/2
Golden State Warriors: 5/1
